name: FEVER
V: Moderate temperature, variable or irregular fever, thirst, anxiety, restlessness
P: Highest temperature, burning sensation, thirst, sweating, irritability, delirium
K: Low grade fever, dullness, heaviness, constant temperature
desc: Fever is the foremost of all diseases and in traditional cultures the main killer. Fever is more significant in Pitta disorders and is their main characteristic, along with other heat sensations like inflammation, infection and burning sensation. Acute fever is more Pitta. Constant fever at low temperature is more Kapha. Irregular, intermittent, or variable fever is more Vata.
